subject: College Athletics
Football
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Some Tennessee players were discouraged because there might not be a way to get out of their scholarship commitment to the program, even with Lane Kiffin’s abrupt departure for U.S.C.
snippet: Some Tennessee players were discouraged because there might not be a way to get out of their scholarship commitment to the program, even with Lane Kiffin’s abrupt departure for U.S.C.
